package.name: NowInStore_CatalogBuilder
package.summary: Automatically create line sheets, catalogs and flyers of your products that you can print or share online.
package.description:
Our line sheet and catalog builder automatically creates professional and customizable catalogs and flyers for your Magento listings.
Our blog and online-chat experts are on hand that share tips and tricks on how you can use catalogs and flyers to grow your sales.
With a few clicks, import all of your Magento products into a beautiful drag and drop interface. Easily choose and organize each page of your catalog or flyer, use different layouts, customize your front and back covers and add a wholesale contract and order forms.
package.notes: Fix issue with rounded prices Added wholesale price
